name: Channel the Godmind
summary: You tap into the Godmind's collective cognitive well, rapidly parsing near-infinite variables to read your surroundings.
description:
You tap into the Godmind's collective cognitive well, rapidly parsing near-infinite variables to read your surroundings. For 1 minute, you gain precise motion sense out to 60 feet, you can see invisible creatures and objects, and you gain the effects of a 9th-level true seeing.Traits

Aphorite: A type of planar scion descended from a being from Axis, the Plane of Law.
